description: Juleps are a classic Kentucky Derby cocktail, and the Miamian Julep is a delicious twist on the traditional recipe. This cooling cocktail includes&nbsp;whiskey, mint, coconut cream, crème de banane, and fresh lime juice, all blended with ice to create a slushy, green-hued drink.The Miamian Julep is then topped with bourbon-flambéed banana slices, making it a sweet, creamy, and tropical&nbsp;summertime treat. If you're looking for a delicious Kentucky derby cocktail to enjoy this summer, look no further than the Miamian Julep!
name: Miamian’s Julep
recipeIngredient: ½ oz. Lime juice, freshly squeezed
Bourbon-flambéed banana slices, mint sprig, and powdered sugar for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Add the bourbon, coconut cream, crème de banane, lime juice, and mint sprigs into a blender with one cup of ice and blend until smooth.
